unknown_responses.rationale: The segment provides cooking instructions without intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment reports on confirmed cases without intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment reports on test findings without intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment reports on restrictions and testing without intensifiers or comparatives modifying risk adjectives.
The segment uses the risk adjective 'fatal' but it is not modified by an intensifier or comparative.
